entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7 except plus 3 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 7 except plus 3 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
